result.title: Final Enabler for FCs
result.description: D2.3 Final Enabler for FCs (M24)(UNIPD). This deliverable reports the final description of the required FCs enablers and their final implementation and integration with the overall system and their counterpart at FC-scanner level. An evaluation of the proposed solution according to well-defined KPIs is also expected.

result.title: User environment for service composition
result.description: D4.3 User environment for service composition (M24) (EVT). The deliverable describes the functionalities of the intuitive user environment tool and its integration with the latest version of the CaaS. Environment usability aspects will be considered and evaluated.

result.title: Use Case descriptions, Requirements and Market Analysis
result.description: D1.1 Use Case descriptions, Requirements and Market Analysis (v1 M6, v2 M24) (VTT). This deliverable provides a detailed description of the core use cases agreed and committed by the envisioned stakeholders for the expected field trials, based on their business needs and their envisioned customers’ needs. Additionally a corresponding list of requirements will be derived and will be fed into the architecture definition. Use cases and requirements will be updated taking into account use cases added through Open calls as well as feedback from the community (WP6)

result.title: Pilot implementation and evaluation in operational environment
result.description: D5.5. Open calls implementation and evaluation (M36) (UPC). The deliverable describes implementation of the open calls and their evaluation, the collected feedback, the lesson learned and the planned required future work for platform adaptation and extension. By comparing with final state of T5.2, it will devise future platform extension work required after the project end.

result.title: Initial TagItSmart!Reference Architecture and API description
result.description: D1.2 InitialTagItSmart! Reference Architecture and API description (M9) (EVT). This deliverable describes the initial version of the architecture based on the use case description and requirements extraction. It also contains the first definition of the APIs to be implemented in the technical WPs.

result.title: Communication and dissemination plan and report on activities v1
result.description: D6.1 Communication and dissemination plan and report on activities (M3, M12, M24, M36) (v1 UNIPD, v2 UNIS, v3 DNET, v4 UNIPD).In M3, this deliverable will provide the initial plan of dissemination activities, including planned dissemination materials, channels etc. In the following two versions it will be updated to include report on the executed dissemination activities.

result.title: Operational trial on core platform integration
result.description: D5.2 Operational trial on core platform integration (M15) (VTT). The deliverable reports the details of the operational trial activity and tested components. It presents detailed evaluation of the considered components, according pre-defined KPIs (i.e., usability) and the initial plan for architecture integration. It will serve has handbook on available and integrated components for the first open call.

result.title: Secure and reliable FC-scanners usage
result.description: D3.2 Secure and reliable FC-scanners usage (M18) (UNIPD). The deliverable will describe the solutions envisioned in order to guarantee secure and reliable FC-scanners usage and their integration with the existing envisioned architecture components. Results of their evaluation in real field trials should be also reported. Resilience to well-defined security attack will be also considered.
